example: In his memoir, Reminiscences , MacArthur wrote "I learned to ride and shoot even before I could read or write—indeed, almost before I could walk and talk."
example_meaning: Trong hồi ký Reminiscences, MacArthur viết rằng trí nhớ đầu tiên của ông là tiếng kèn quân đội, và ông đã học "cưỡi và bắn ngay trước khi tôi có thể đọc hoặc viết, gần như trước khi tôi có thể đi và nói chuyện."
definition: An act of remembering long-past experiences, often fondly.

example: These elements are referred to as primitives.
example_meaning: Những yếu tố này được gọi là những nguyên thủy (primitives).
definition: Plural form of element.

example: Just one more suture .

definition: Seam formed by sewing two edges (especially of skin) together.

example: Hello, Mr. Bates .
example_meaning: Xin chào, Mr. Bates .
definition: (transitive) To reduce the force of something; to abate.

example: They call him " The Plumber " in Italy, as well as " Maestro , " because he actually is engineer and craftsman and sculptor at the same time.

definition: A master in some art, especially a composer or conductor.

example: That's because you're trying to remove your corneas .

example: Elated , Martin left immediately for Palmyra with the manuscript.

definition: (transitive) To make joyful or proud.

example: Give me the wretched name!

example: You signed a contract .

definition: Made smaller by contraction.

definition: (transitive) To take away secretly by force; to carry away (a human being) wrongfully and usually by violence; to kidnap.

example: Therefore, it might be said that the potential human race within his loins died with him.
example_meaning: Thế nên có thể nói là dòng giống loài người tiềm tàng trong ngài cũng chết theo ngài.
definition: In a manner showing much potential; with the possibility of happening in a given way.

example: In part, this is because the carbohydrates in the flour receive an ample amount of hydration during the kneading and leavening process.
example_meaning: Một phần vì trong quá trình nhào bột và lên men, chất hydrat carbon trong bột có nhiều thời gian để hút nước.
definition: (chemistry) A solid compound containing or linked to water molecules.

example: During His earthly ministry, He taught men the higher law.
example_meaning: Trong giáo vụ trần thế của Ngài, Ngài đã giảng dạy luật pháp cao hơn cho loài người.
definition: in an earthy manner

example: She plays songs on the jukebox .
example_meaning: Cô ấy hát ở chỗ máy hát .
definition: A coin-operated machine that plays recorded music; it has push-buttons to make selections.

example: I think we would like for dispensing errors to be zero, wouldn't we?

example: I prefer a text a bit rhapsodic by someone who thinks out of the box over the bland writing of marketing fiends.

definition: (intransitive) to show enthusiasm

example: Manna gatherer?
example_meaning: Hay lượm ma-na ?

example: He and the bulk of his force withdrew from Alexandria, while Saladin was left with the task of guarding the city.
example_meaning: Ông này và một số lớn quân của mình rút ra khỏi Alexandria trong khi Saladin đã được để lại với ít quân hơn với nhiệm vụ bảo vệ thành phố.
definition: Size, mass or volume.

example: Despite such a positive appraisal , some voices try to present Jehovah’s Witnesses in quite a different light.

definition: A judgment or assessment of the value of something, especially a formal one.

example: Change Stencil Font

definition: A utensil that contains a perforated sheet through which ink can be forced to create a printed pattern onto a surface.

example: Lofty spirits and unswerving pride
example_meaning: Khí thế cao ngất và lòng tự hào bất dịch
definition: Not deviating; not yielding or straying or varying.

example: Don't read like a dog lapping at his plate!
example_meaning: Con hãy dùng cách đọc như đang dùng lưỡi liếm dĩa.

example: It can be made out of rope, a clothesline, twine .
example_meaning: Chúng được tạo bởi dây thừng, dây phơi quần áo hay bông sợi xe .
definition: A twist; a convolution.

example: Eventually, she dedicated her life to Jehovah and was baptized.
example_meaning: Cuối cùng, cô hiến dâng đời sống cho Đức Giê-hô-va và làm báp têm.

example: The tracks with Rodney Jerkins were recorded at the Hit Factory in Miami, Florida.
example_meaning: Những bài hát hợp tác với Rodney Jerkins được thu âm tại The Hit Factory ở Miami, Florida.
definition: (dated) A type of garment: a close-fitting collarless jacket, with or without sleeves.

example: Put that dirk down, Boyle.

definition: A long Scottish dagger with a straight blade.

example: because it's a palimpsest of things.

definition: A manuscript or document that has been erased or scraped clean, for reuse of the paper, parchment, vellum, or other medium on which it was written. Many historical texts have been recovered using ultraviolet light and other technologies to read the erased writing.

example: Fifty on Winsome Lass to win.
example_meaning: Năm mươi đô-la bắt Winsome Lass.
definition: Charming; inspiring trust and approval; especially if in an innocent manner.

example: Great and manifold are our blessings today.

the downward slope of a hill
(law) The legal right to use and derive profit or benefit from property that belongs to another person, as long as the property is not damaged.

example: Social commentary and irreverence rise throughout the 70s.

definition: The state or quality of being irreverent; want of proper reverence; disregard of the authority and character of a superior.

example: "What is augmented commerce?".
example_meaning: Phát triển sản phẩm theo hướng nào?"
definition: The act or process of augmenting.

example: He also designed a book bag for women.
example_meaning: Ông nội cũng đã thiết kế một cặp đựng sách cho phụ nữ.
definition: The act of designating; a pointing out or showing; indication.

example: Cold feet .
example_meaning: Chân lạnh quá.
definition: timidity that prevents the continuation of a course of action; "I was going to tell him but I got cold feet"
